additional_functions.name: oracle_detect_activities

additional_functions.oracle_compliance: Maintains access to all 8 Oracle 4.2 dimensions via compact representation
additional_functions.token_efficiency: Uses compact format (1,000 tokens vs 15,000 full descriptions)
additional_functions.methodology_preserved: Complete Oracle 4.2 framework accessible - no filtering or pre-selection
additional_functions.dimensions_supported: R, SF, TG, SM, E, TT, PR, F (complete 8-dimension framework)
additional_functions.advanced_capabilities: Includes modern challenges: digital wellness (TT), productivity optimization (PR), financial coaching (F)

parameters: codes: array of Oracle activity codes (optional)

additional_functions.oracle_compliance: All 8 dimensions and 265+ activities included - complete Oracle 4.2 methodology preserved

additional_functions.name: oracle_get_statistics
additional_functions.description: FT-144/FT-179: Get EXACT Oracle 4.2 statistics from loaded data - NEVER approximate
additional_functions.critical_instruction: ALWAYS use this command when user asks about Oracle catalog size, activity counts, dimensions, or objectives

returns.total_activities: Exact count from loaded Oracle data
returns.total_objectives: Exact count from goals mapping data
returns.objectives_list: Complete list of all objective codes

mandatory_usage: "qual o tamanho do seu catálogo?" → oracle_get_statistics REQUIRED
"me fale sobre suas atividades" → oracle_get_statistics REQUIRED
additional_functions.never_approximate: NEVER guess or approximate Oracle statistics - ALWAYS query exact data
